Key Match Events: Brandon King and Evin Lewis scored 74 runs in the powerplay for West Indies
Sri Lanka's top order failed to prosper on a helpful surface
Kamindu Mendis took the wicket of the opposition's top scorer, Brandon King
Miscellaneous Highlights: The half-centuries from Kamindu and Asalanka ended up as mere footnotes in the game
Others: West Indies won by 5 wickets (with 5 balls remaining)
Shamar Joseph was the most economical of West Indies' bowlers
Shamar Joseph conceded only 27 from his four overs
